page.title: 03INDUSTRIAL DEVELOPMENT
page.content: The growth of local industry has been steady in recent years with light industry the dominant feature. Four industrial sites have been established in the central area; The Piette,The Bouet,Pitronnerie and The Braye industrial estates.These sites have all attracted buisnesses in recent years.The increasing wealth of the Island has aided growth in the manufacturing and service industries producing goods for home consumption. Relics of a past industry in the form of granite quarries,are scattered sparingly over the landscape.
